title: The future of our fight for every heartbeat (British Heart Foundation)
text: ( Source : British Heart Foundation ) 19 October 2015 This week we launch our new Research Strategy . It outlines our ambitious plans to fund over half a billion pounds of science over the next five years. Our Medical Director , Professor Peter
